gpt_comment: The weather in Brussels is set to be sunny, with temperatures peaking at 29°C and dipping to a cool 17°C at night. There's a general consensus on no rainfall during the day. Seems like an ideal day for lounging in the park, perhaps even spot some playful monkeys in the Brussels' Zoo.
